privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: At Sporton, we are committed to protecting the privacy of all users.

points.title: Data Security
points.content: Your personal data is stored with high security standards.

points.title: No Third Parties
points.content: We never sell or share your data for commercial use.

points.title: User Rights
points.content: You can edit or delete your data anytime from settings.

refundPolicy.title: Refund Policy
refundPolicy.description: All subscriptions and paid services on Sporton are non-refundable once activated.

points.title: Technical Exceptions
points.content: Refunds are only granted if a technical error on our side prevents the user from accessing the service.

points.title: Payment Disputes
points.content: Users may submit an official request within 90 days of the transaction in case of a payment dispute.

points.title: Review Standards
points.content: Requests are reviewed according to international standards (Visa / MasterCard). If approved, refunds are processed to the original payment method **minus the payment provider’s transfer fees**.

points.title: Refund Method
points.content: No cash refunds are provided; all refunds are processed electronically only.
